house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1997 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, patio.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, EatIn Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Kitchen Island, Pantry
